mapper.select:
select id, report_config_id, field, title, width, minWidth, type, sort, unresize, edit, event, style, align, colspan, rowspan, templet, toolbar, role, sf_showlist, sf_x, sf_y, sf_ajax, stype, ssort, sf_show, sf_del, sf_use, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4, bak5, bak6, create_user, create_user_id, create_date, status, update_date, update_user, remarks, audit_status, fileId from report_column where 1=1
and id like '%${id}%'
and report_config_id like '%${reportConfigId}%'
and field like '%${field}%'
and title like '%${title}%'
and width like '%${width}%'
and minWidth like '%${minwidth}%'
and type like '%${type}%'
and sort like '%${sort}%'
and unresize like '%${unresize}%'
and edit like '%${edit}%'
and event like '%${event}%'
and style like '%${style}%'
and align like '%${align}%'
and colspan like '%${colspan}%'
and rowspan like '%${rowspan}%'
and templet like '%${templet}%'
and toolbar like '%${toolbar}%'
and role like '%${role}%'
and sf_showlist like '%${sfShowlist}%'
and sf_x like '%${sfX}%'
and sf_y like '%${sfY}%'
and sf_ajax like '%${sfAjax}%'
and stype like '%${stype}%'
and ssort like '%${ssort}%'
and sf_show like '%${sfShow}%'
and sf_del like '%${sfDel}%'
and sf_use like '%${sfUse}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
and bak4 like '%${bak4}%'
and bak5 like '%${bak5}%'
and bak6 like '%${bak6}%'
and create_user like '%${createUser}%'
and create_user_id like '%${createUserId}%'
and create_date like '%${createDate}%'
and status like '%${status}%'
and update_date like '%${updateDate}%'
and update_user like '%${updateUser}%'
and remarks like '%${remarks}%'
and audit_status like '%${auditStatus}%'
and fileId like '%${fileid}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
select id,'1' as 'pid','1' as 'parentId',name,name as text,id as code from report_config where status = 2
